faq.title: FAQ
faq.lead: Answers about JadeAI credits, languages, and privacy.
faq.q1: Do you use your own AI?
faq.a1: JadeAI is powered by Gemini for reliable, high‑quality responses.
faq.a2: English, Turkish, German, Spanish, Portuguese and French are supported.
faq.a3: One credit = one generated content. Free users get 5 credits with Google login; Premium pack offers 50 credits for $5.
faq.a4: Your content is private by default. Sharing to the community is optional and fully anonymous.
